name: py-watchfiles

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Simple, modern and high performance file watching and code reload in
python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-maturin
dependencies.description:
Build and publish crates with pyo3, rust-cpython and cffi bindings as
well as rust binaries as python packages.

dependencies.name: py-anyio
dependencies.description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.
